entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the morning. A few rain showers beginning in the morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
